thread.title: maria
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by maria

author: maria
title: maria
text:
Every year I go to the Rhode Island college plan center. They are very professional and sensitive to my inexperience navigating through the fafsa Web page.
I am grateful that this service is provided to us.
Sincerely
